name: Cherry Cake War Angels Deluxe Demo
name_original: Cherry Cake War Angels Deluxe Demo
description:
The forces of Hell have declared war on the Holy Kingdom and its up to the soldiers of Her Immaculate Army,  The War Angels, to defeat evil and restore peace! Play as one of HIA's Archangels and shoot your way through enemies and other objects as you rescue injured allies and try to earn your rank as the perfect War Angel.

*If you come across any bugs or other oddities during gameplay, don't hesitate to let me know! Your feedback is greatly appreciated!
